abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if your opponent has 4 or more Benched Pokémon, you may choose 1 of them and return that Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand. This power can't be used if Crawdaunt ex is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Crawdaunt ex.
